description:
Change of use to A1/A2 or A3 on front ground floor and remainder of building to 68  two bedroom flats and 21 one bedroomed flats involving part demolition, erection of extension at fourth floor level, formation of basement, mezzanine, formation of balconies and terraces, alterations to front elevation including new shop fronts and recladding and alterations to windows on all elevations. 

 APPLICANTS PLAN NOS.:-  854/09; 854/07A, 08, 10A-18A, 19,                         20A, 21, 22A, 23B, 24A
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
